taskDescription: Look at the structures of Vestenamer and Norsorex and show how they might be made by olefin metathesis polymerization.
detailedSolution: Vestenamer: ADMET polymerization of 1,9-decadiene or ROMP of cyclooctene; Norsorex: ROMP of norbornene.
